name: Fashion Stylist| Dress Up Game
description:
Be a fabulous Fashion Stylist and dress up a super model to rule all the fashion runways around the world!

If you are looking for dress up or makeup games or fashion games where you could dress up a cute princess and make her look better looking in a make-up salon, you have landed at the exact right place. You can learn to create your fashion profile using the game. With different princess girl characters, you will never get bored of playing the stylist and designer game as there is always a new princess character to play with. This is one of the unique fashion games where you act like a makeover artist or a fashion designer who is busy making the fashion model look more attractive and fashionable.
As a Fashion Stylist and dress designer, you will enjoy dressing up the princess doll in this dress up and makeup game. You can practice dressing up for wedding events, fashion events, or other events. You can also participate in a dressing up and makeover competition and become the best stylist and designer in the competition.
Fashion Stylist is the most beautiful offline fashion designer game of 2022. It is one of the most unique fashion games for girls to practice makeup, dress, and makeup for teen girls.

* GAME HIGHLIGHTS
- Various fashionable outfits and gorgeous bridal makeup. Play with the real or luxury game theme
- Various fashion styles: casual, party, beach, wedding….. and more
- Participate in the dressing game challenge and fashion competition - Compete with other fashion lovers & earn diamonds
- Play the girl makeup game and makeover with hairstyles, eyes, lips, cheeks, etc.
- Check out your dressing style score in-game challenge
- Unlock new topics/items with the diamonds that you collect
- Gorgeous collection of the fashion world for the fashionable people!

With the above amazing features at hand, you will never get bored of the dress-up game and remain entertained for hours.


* Support Us
Do you have any feedback for this makeup and fashion dress up game? Please feel free to send us your feedback.
If you like our game, please rate us on the play store and share it among your friends.
